title: I_Anime
author: I_Anime
content: I just discovered that we are among the group in the locals and am so proud of it that we are recognised here but I have some questions:Why don't we have a moderator? What is a child board and how can we have one?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Theymos would be the best person to tell us why we do not have a moderate, but I guess it is because we can still report any post we see not appropriate and there would be a fast response from global moderators and other moderators that theymos assigned to our local board.To have a child board, that means you are discussing more about a particular aspect that should belong to a certain board on our local board, example that I have known is 'politics and society' which may be the first child board that we may have. You can bring up a topic about it, let people discuss about it to know if there is a need for such child board and you can have a representative to message theymos about the need for the child board. If most of the topics on this fist page of our local board is pertaining to the board that you are requesting for, it would be given.
